text: Boola: â€œEsie shendolangakhwo mukandafimbulilwa eshindu shiakanibwa okhulibwa halali shibe nishifwile eshiene(mutsisolo) nohomba amalasile nohomba inyama yeyimbitsi, shichila obo ni obumali, nohomba shisinzilwe nishilarumbulilwekho elira lia Nyasaye tawe. Halali ulia unichilisibwa, nalekombele noho okhubura eshichelo tawe. Awo toto Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi niwokhuleshela, Owetsimbabaasi
